text: @UPSHelp @ScottForensics I‚Äôve already DMd you @UPSHelp and @AppleSupport with no response. My phone went from Shenzhen, to ‚ÄòCleared Customs‚Äô and is now apparently in Hong Kong! It‚Äôs just a phone, but care to explain this???
